title: ‘Sucks for Sam’ Says Martin Shkreli as Bankman-Fried Is Booked Into Brooklyn Prison
description: The Brooklyn jail previously held Ghislaine Maxwell and Martin Shkreli.

title: Former SEC Attorney John Reed Stark Says SEC Will Not Approve a Bitcoin Spot ETF
description: The attorney says a Republican administration after 2024 would be friendlier to ETF applications and roll back enforcement actions.

title: Amid Gold’s Recent Slide, Experts Predict a Shining Future with Potential Highs Beyond $2,500 by 2024
description: In recent times, gold and silver have faced a downtrend, with gold losing over 2% of its value in the past month and silver tumbling more than 5% against the U.S. dollar. Even amid gold’s rather uninspiring performance this last month, David Neuhauser, the founder of the investment company Livermore Partners, forecasts that gold’s worth […]
